item.title: Action Creates Motivation, Not Motivation Creates Action
item.description: Action Creates Motivation, Not Motivation Creates Action Reminds me of [[Start, Then Learn. Don’t Learn, Then Start]].

item.title: I Read 100 Procrastination Books to Learn These 3 lessons… - YouTube
item.description: I Read 100 Procrastination Books to Learn These 3 lessons… - YouTube Procrastination = negative emotions positive emotions TOO MUCH FRICTION = PROCRASTINATION NO PLANNING = PLANNING TO PROCRASTINATE [[Action Creates Motivation, Not Motivation Creates Action]] [[2-Minute Rule]] and [[2-Day Rule]]
